title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1022.3 - Vehicles subject to inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1022.3 - Vehicles subject to inspection

State Regulations

Before using any vehicular crossing, all vehicles shall be
subject to inspection by an employee of the Triborough Bridge and Tunnel

Authority, properly identified, or a New York City police officer, to determine
whether such use would be in violation of these rules and
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1022.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
